subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With the already contentious series tied 2-2, the N.B.A. took a hard line Tuesday that ended up punishing the Suns far more than the Spurs entering Game 5.
snippet: With the already contentious series tied 2-2, the N.B.A. took a hard line Tuesday that ended up punishing the Suns far more than the Spurs entering Game 5.
